oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Man and boy selling walnuts and peanuts at a street stand, circa 1933
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of an elderly man and young boy standing in front of a 1917-1923 Ford Model T Coupe next to a table with baskets of walnuts and baskets of peanuts. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Popular Culture; Shopping; Agriculture--Tennessee--Nashville; Street vendors--Tennessee--Nashville; Selling--Food--Tennessee--Nashville; Ford Model T automobile--Pictorial works;
Nashville (Tenn.)--Commerce; Nashville (Tenn.)--History--20th century--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social conditions;
